title: The fungible compensatory area shall be permissible for rehab without charging premium and to the incentive BUA by charging premium
clause_text: The fungible compensatory area shall be permissible for rehab without charging premium and to the incentive BUA by charging premium.
section: Removal and re-accommodation of tolerated /protected structures falling in the alignment of road: -
